featured.text: What does “a new chapter” in line 2, paragraph 1 mean? (A) A new unit of a book.
The chambers are stacked side-by-side, two units high, with the upper rooms reached by a ladder.

definition.zh_def: 單位；一個用於計量或計算的標準量。
definition.en_def: A single, distinct part of a whole, often used as a standard measurement.
definition.example: Each unit of the product costs ten dollars.
